mapper.select: select a.content_id, a.content_type_id, t.content_type_name, a.title, a.addr1, a.addr2, a.tel, a.first_image, a.readcount, a.sido_code, a.gugun_code, a.latitude, a.longitude from attraction_info a inner join type t on a.content_type_id = t.content_type_id where content_id=#{contentId}
